title: We Are All Okay After Tornado Hits Nashville + TV Producer Robert Deaton Fills In For Lunchbox
itunes:title: We Are All Okay After Tornado Hits Nashville + TV Producer Robert Deaton Fills In For Lunchbox
description:
Our home, Nashville was hit by a deadly tornado overnight causing severe damage to many areas in the downtown area. Thankfully, everyone on the show is safe. Amy had to take shelter with her family, but storms missed Bobby's area of town. TV Producer, Robert Deaton fills in for Lunchbox. He shares many 'behind the scenes' accounts of the CMA and Billboard Awards shows he produces.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
